string.description: Describes a UI element on which an action may be performed by the user [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: check_title_class_name_not_supported

resources.string: Unsupported item type

resources.string: Readability

resources.string: Item type label

string.name: check_title_speakable_text_present

resources.string: Item label

string.name: check_title_touch_target_size

resources.string: Banned word

string.name: clickable

string.name: clickable_and_long_clickable

string.description: The question message for question of if the foreground and background colors are correct [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: question_id_message_confirm_foreground_background_colors

resources.string: Are the detected foreground and background colors correct?

string.description: The question prompting a user to provide a background color [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: question_id_message_provide_background_color

resources.string: What is the correct background color?

string.description: The question prompting a user to provide a foreground color [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: question_id_message_provide_foreground_color

resources.string: What is the correct foreground color?

string.name: question_message_identify_unexposed_items

resources.string: Select regions of the screen with unidentified items.

string.name: question_message_screen_has_unexposed_items

resources.string: Does this screen contain important items that are not outlined?

string.description: The user selection option for if only the background color is incorrect. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: question_option_message_background_incorrect

resources.string: Background incorrect

string.description: The user selection option for if the foreground and background colors are both correct [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: question_option_message_both_correct

resources.string: Both correct

string.name: question_option_message_both_incorrect

resources.string: Foreground and background incorrect

string.name: question_option_message_foreground_incorrect

resources.string: Foreground incorrect

string.description: The user selection option for if it is unknown if the foreground and background colors are both incorrect.[CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: question_option_message_unknown

resources.string: Unknown

string.description: A message that is appended to a result message of a check indicating the view (UI element) may only be partially visible and is against the scrollable edge of a parent (a larger containing UI element). [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_against_scrollable_edge

resources.string: This item may be only partially visible within a scrollable container.

string.description: A message that is appended to a result message of a check describing that the result may be ignored in the case where this view's (UI element) parent (a larger containing UI element) performs the same action of this view when clicked. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_clickable_ancestor

resources.string: A parent container may be handling touch events for this item. If selecting the larger container performs the same action as selecting this item, consider defining this item as not clickable. If a different action is performed, consider increasing the size of this item.

string.description: A message that is appended to a result message of a check describing that this view's (UI element) parent (a containing UI element) is clipping (constraining in size) the size of this item. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_clipped_by_ancestor

resources.string: A parent container may be clipping the size of this item, which has a drawing area of <tt>%1$ddp</tt> x <tt>%2$ddp</tt>. Consider increasing the size of this item\'s clipping ancestor, or allowing a larger parent container to handle actions on behalf of this item.

string.description: A description of a view's (UI element's) opacity including level of translucency. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_opacity_description

resources.string: Its actual opacity is %1$.2f%%.

string.description: A message that is appended to a result message of a check describing that the result may be inaccurate because this view (UI element) uses a 'TouchDelegate', which allows a developer to define their own touchable region for the view. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_touch_delegate

resources.string: A <tt>TouchDelegate</tt> has been detected on one of this item\'s ancestors. This message can be ignored if the delegate is of sufficient size and handles touches for this item.

string.description: A message that is appended to a result message of a check describing that the result may be inaccurate because this view (UI element) uses a 'TouchDelegate', which allows a developer to define their own touchable region for the view. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_touch_delegate_with_hit_rect

resources.string: A <tt>TouchDelegate</tt> with size <tt>%1$ddp</tt> x <tt>%2$ddp</tt> has been detected for this item. Consider increasing the size of its hit <tt>Rect</tt>.

string.description: A message that is appended to a result message of a check describing that the view (UI element) may be obscured by other on-screen content. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_addendum_view_potentially_obscured

resources.string: This item may be obscured by other on-screen content. Consider manually testing this item\'s contrast.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view's background is non-opaque/translucent. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_background_must_be_opaque

resources.string: This items\'s background color is not opaque.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the word used in this string is inappropriate. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_banned_word

resources.string: This item\'s text may contain an inappropriate word, "<tt>%1$s</tt>"

string.description: The brief result message describing an inappropriate word being used. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_banned_word

resources.string: Consider removing inappropriate words from this item\'s text

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) has redundant or unnecessary text within its 'android:contentDescription' attribute. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_content_desc_contains_redundant_word

resources.string: This item\'s <tt>android:contentDescription</tt> might contain unnecessary text.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of the image in this view (UI element) is lower than the required ratio. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_image_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: Consider increasing the contrast ratio between this image\'s foreground and background.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that an element is not exposed to accessibility services [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_is_unexposed_item_screen_region

resources.string: Consider exposing items in this region to accessibility services.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that link text is not descriptive. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_link_text_not_descriptive

resources.string: Consider using more descriptive text in the link.

string.description: The brief result message if text has a low readability score. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_low_reading_score

resources.string: This text may have a low readability score.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that multiple items (UI elements) share the same description that would be spoken by a screen reader. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE}
string.name: result_message_brief_same_speakable_text

resources.string: Multiple items have the same description.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that multiple actionable items (UI elements) share the same space on the screen. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_same_view_bounds

resources.string: Multiple %1$s items share this location on the screen.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that the size of this view (UI element) may be too small to be touched or interacted with reliably. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_small_touch_target

resources.string: Consider making this clickable item larger.

string.description: The brief message describing that using bold typeface is ideal. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_styled_text

resources.string: Consider removing %1$s styling on longer passages of text.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of the text in this TextView (UI element) is lower than the required ratio. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_text_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: Consider increasing this item\'s text foreground to background contrast ratio.

string.description: The brief result message of a check describing that this view may be presented incorrectly to the user when traversed with a screen reader. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_brief_unpredictable_traversal

resources.string: Traversal behavior with screen readers may be unpredictable.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the class name is empty and not supported by the accessibility service. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_class_name_is_empty

resources.string: This item\'s type may not be reported to accessibility services. Consider using a type defined by the Android SDK.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the class name is unknown. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_class_name_is_unknown

resources.string: This item\'s type could not be determined.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the class name is not supported by the accessibility service. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_class_name_not_supported_brief

resources.string: This item\'s type may not be supported.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the class name is not supported by the accessibility service. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_class_name_not_supported_detail

resources.string: This item\'s type <tt>%1$s</tt> may not be resolvable by accessibility services. Consider using a type defined by the Android SDK.

string.description: The result message of a check describing the specific android class of the view (UI element) could not be determined. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_clickablespan_no_determined_type

resources.string: This item\'s type is undetermined.

string.description: The result message of a check stating that a description of a view (UI element) has redundant or unnecessary text (ex: a view of type Button whose 'android:contentDescription' is 'Save button'). [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_content_desc_contains_redundant_word

resources.string: This item\'s <tt>android:contentDescription</tt>, \"<tt>%1$s</tt>\" contains the item type \"<tt>%2$s</tt>\".

string.description: The result message of a check stating that a description of a view (UI element) ends with that view's type (ex: a view of type Button whose 'android:contentDescription' is 'Save button'). [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_content_desc_ends_with_view_type

resources.string: This item\'s <tt>android:contentDescription</tt>, \"<tt>%1$s</tt>\" ends with the item\'s type.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the background color of a view (UI element) could not be determined. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_could_not_get_background_color

resources.string: This item\'s background color could not be determined.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the color of the text within a view (UI element) could not be determined. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_could_not_get_text_color

resources.string: This item\'s text color could not be determined.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the height of this view (UI element) is below the user-defined minimum requirement. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_customized_small_touch_target_height

resources.string: This item\'s height is <tt>%1$ddp</tt>. Consider increasing the height of this touch target to at least the configured minimum height of <tt>%2$ddp</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the width of this view (UI element) is below the user-defined minimum requirement. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_customized_small_touch_target_width

resources.string: This item\'s width is <tt>%1$ddp</tt>. Consider increasing the width of this touch target to at least the configured minimum width of <tt>%2$ddp</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the width and height of this view (UI element) are both below user-defined minimum requirements. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_customized_small_touch_target_width_and_height

resources.string: This item\'s size is <tt>%1$ddp</tt> x <tt>%2$ddp</tt>. Consider increasing this touch target to at least the configured minimum size of <tt>%3$ddp</tt> x <tt>%4$ddp</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that an event can be disruptive to the user. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_disruptive_announcement

resources.string: A disruptive accessibility announcement has been used.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this editable view (UI element) should not populate its 'android:contentDescription' attribute. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_editable_textview_content_desc

resources.string: This editable <tt>TextView</tt> has an <tt>android:contentDescription</tt>. A screen reader may read this attribute instead of the editable content when the user is navigating.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this check can only be run in English locales. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_english_locale_only

resources.string: This check only runs on devices with locales set to English.

string.description: The result message if user was uncertain if a screen has any UI elements that were not exposed properly to accessibility services. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_has_unexposed_items

resources.string: This screen may have items that are not exposed to accessibility services.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of the image in this view (UI element) is lower than the required ratio. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_image_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: The image\'s contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on an estimated foreground color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt> and an estimated background color of <tt>#%4$06X</tt>. Consider increasing this ratio to %2$.2f or greater.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of the image in this view (UI element) is lower than a user-defined ratio. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_image_customized_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: The image\'s contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on an estimated foreground color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt> and an estimated background color of <tt>#%4$06X</tt>. Consider increasing this ratio to the configured ratio of %2$.2f or greater.

string.description: The result message if a screen region contains an unexposed element [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_is_unexposed_item_screen_region

resources.string: The region with on-screen location <tt>%1$s</tt> contains at least one item that is not exposed to accessibility services.

string.description: The result message indicating that the user must provide more information to determine if all UI elements within a view hierarchy are exposed properly to accessibility services. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_item_exposed_needs_manual_assessment

resources.string: This screen needs manual inspection to ensure all items are exposed to accessibility services.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that link text is not descriptive. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_link_text_not_descriptive

resources.string: The link text \"<tt>%1$s</tt>\" may not independently convey the link\'s purpose.

string.description: The full result message if text has a low readability score. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_low_reading_score

resources.string: This item\'s text has an approximate readability score of %1$.0f, which is lower than the recommended score of %2$.0f. Consider using simpler words or sentences to make the text easier to read.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this View (UI element) has no description that would be spoken to the user by a screen reader if this view were to be focused. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_missing_speakable_text

resources.string: This item may not have a label readable by screen readers.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) does not have any text set for the android contentDescription attribute. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_no_content_desc

resources.string: This item has no <tt>android:contentDescription</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that we were unable to obtain a screenshot. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_no_screencapture

resources.string: Screen capture data could not be obtained.

string.description: The message if this check was unable to get typeface info for a TextView. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_no_typeface_info

resources.string: This item\'s typeface could not be determined.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) is not clickable. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_clickable

resources.string: This view is not clickable.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) does not contain editable text content. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_editable_textview

resources.string: This item is not an editable <tt>TextView</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) is in a 'not enabled' or 'disabled' state. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_enabled

resources.string: This item isn\'t enabled.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) is not an instance of the android class ImageView. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_imageview

resources.string: This item is not an <tt>ImageView</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) is not exposed to a screen reader or other accessibility service. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_important_for_accessibility

resources.string: This item was not found to be important for accessibility.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) is not an instance of the android TextView class [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_text_view

resources.string: This item is not a <tt>TextView</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) is not currently visible to the user. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_not_visible

resources.string: This item is not visible.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) has the same text to be spoken by a screen reader as another view which has the same clickability. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_same_speakable_text

resources.string: This %1$s item\'s speakable text: \"<tt>%2$s</tt>\" is identical to that of %3$d other item(s).

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) shares exact same space on the screen as another view which has the same clickability and long clickability. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_same_view_bounds

resources.string: This %1$s item has the same on-screen location (<tt>%2$s</tt>) as %3$d other item(s) with those properties.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the screenshot of a view (UI element) was hidden. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_screencapture_data_hidden

resources.string: Screen capture information for this item was hidden.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the screenshot of a view (UI element) has a uniform color. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_screencapture_uniform_color

resources.string: Screen capture has a uniform color.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the check is not applicable since specific Android SDK version. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_sdk_version_not_applicable

resources.string: This check is not applicable on devices running Android %1$s and above.

string.description: The result message if text is too short to run a check on. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_short_text

resources.string: This item\'s text is too short to be evaluated.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that a screen reader would not focus this view (UI element). [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_should_not_focus

resources.string: This item would not be focused by a screen reader.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the height of this view (UI element) is below the minimum requirement. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_small_touch_target_height

resources.string: This item\'s height is <tt>%1$ddp</tt>. Consider making the height of this touch target <tt>%2$ddp</tt> or larger.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the width of this view (UI element) is below the minimum requirement. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_small_touch_target_width

resources.string: This item\'s width is <tt>%1$ddp</tt>. Consider making the width of this touch target <tt>%2$ddp</tt> or larger.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the width and height of this view (UI element) are both below minimum requirements. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_small_touch_target_width_and_height

resources.string: This item\'s size is <tt>%1$ddp</tt> x <tt>%2$ddp</tt>. Consider making this touch target <tt>%3$ddp</tt> wide and <tt>%4$ddp</tt> high or larger.

string.description: The result message of a check describing the text that would be spoken to the user by a screen reader if this view (UI element) were to be focused. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_speakable_text

resources.string: This %1$s item also has speakable text: \"<tt>%2$s</tt>\".

string.description: The full result message if text uses italic style. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_styled_text

resources.string: This item may use %1$s font for a long passage of text. Consider removing the style from the font to improve readability.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view's text is non-opaque/translucent. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_text_must_be_opaque

resources.string: This item\'s text color is not opaque.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of this TextView (UI element) is lower than the required ratio. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_textview_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: The item\'s text contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on a text color of <tt>#%2$06X</tt> and background color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt>. Consider increasing this item\'s text contrast ratio to %4$.2f or greater.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this TextView (UI element) has no text. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_textview_empty

resources.string: This <tt>TextView</tt> is empty.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of this TextView (UI element) is lower than the required ratio unless its text is considered to be large. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_textview_heuristic_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: The item\'s text contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on an estimated foreground color of <tt>#%2$06X</tt> and an estimated background color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt>. Consider using colors that result in a contrast ratio greater than %4$.2f for small text, or %5$.2f for large text.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of this TextView (UI element) is lower than the required ratio unless its text is considered to be large. Result based on colors obtained or confirmed through questions. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_textview_heuristic_contrast_not_sufficient_confirmed

resources.string: The item\'s text contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on the provided foreground color of <tt>#%2$06X</tt> and provided background color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt>. Consider using colors that result in a contrast ratio greater than %4$.2f for small text, or %5$.2f for large text.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of this TextView (UI element) is lower than a user-defined ratio. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_textview_heuristic_customized_contrast_not_sufficient

resources.string: The item\'s text contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on an estimated foreground color of <tt>#%2$06X</tt> and an estimated background color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt>. Consider increasing this item\'s text contrast ratio to the configured ratio of %4$.2f or greater.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the contrast ratio (the ratio of the luminance of the foreground and background colors) of this TextView (UI element) is lower than a user-defined ratio based on user provided colors. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_textview_heuristic_customized_contrast_not_sufficient_confirmed

resources.string: The item\'s text contrast ratio is %1$.2f. This ratio is based on the provided foreground color of <tt>#%2$06X</tt> and provided background color of <tt>#%3$06X</tt>. Consider increasing this item\'s text contrast ratio to the configured ratio of %4$.2f or greater.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) may be presented incorrectly to the user when traversed with a screen reader. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_traversal_cycle

resources.string: This item may be part of a traversal ordering cycle due to its <tt>%1$s</tt> attribute. Traversal behavior with screen readers may be unpredictable.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that this view (UI element) may be presented incorrectly to the user when traversed with a screen reader. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_traversal_over_constrained

resources.string: Traversal ordering for this item may be over constrained based on its <tt>android:accessibilityTraversalBefore</tt> and <tt>android:accessibilityTraversalAfter</tt> attributes. Traversal behavior with screen readers may be unpredictable.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that the view has text marked up with an android URLSpan (a hyperlink), which has an invalid URL. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_urlspan_invalid_url

resources.string: Verify that the URL within this item\'s <tt>URLSpan</tt> is valid.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that views should use the android concept of a 'URLSpan' instead of a 'ClickableSpan', for improved accessibility. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_urlspan_not_clickablespan

resources.string: This item should use a <tt>URLSpan</tt> in place of a <tt>ClickableSpan</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing the position of this view (UI element) on the screen.
string.name: result_message_view_bounds

resources.string: This %1$s item also has an on-screen location of <tt>%2$s</tt>.

string.description: The result message of a check describing that all or part of the view (UI element) was off the screen when the screenshot was taken. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_view_not_within_screencapture

resources.string: This item\'s on-screen location (<tt>%1$s</tt>) were not within the screen capture on-screen location (<tt>%2$s</tt>).

string.description: The result message of a check describing that web content (UI element shown within a browser) was not evaluated. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: result_message_web_content

resources.string: Web content is not evaluated.

string.description: Describes underlined text styling. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: underline_text

resources.string: underline
